amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting workforce development through apprenticeship programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 720 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 720 proposed by Senator Booker. (consideration: CR S1982-1983; text: CR S1982) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting workforce development through apprenticeship programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 720 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 720 proposed by Senator Booker.
